lines.text: So why aren't you laughing? You should have everything you want? A home, a husband, six children. Why aren't you laughing?
Order is the virtue of the mediocrity.
What is it you have against him?
I say this for your own good. Certain people are bad for your name. I didn't want to say it... but that one from the sixth is a wart, a traitor... an antifascist. In short, a bastard.
That's the worst part. You try to seem different from what you really are. They force you to feel ashamed of yourself. To hide.
